thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk
thread.title: Mrs L Blower
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by Mrs L Blower

author: Mrs L Blower
title: Mrs L Blower
text: I recently brought a Waverly oak compact unit and the colour didn't match my other items of same range that I have, emailed shop and within 15 minutes they phoned and said they would exchange and would be ready to pick up in one week. Excellent service and would recommend.
